articles.title: PM welcomes African Union into G20 with hug, urges to end global trust deficit - India Today
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi officially welcomes the African Union as a permanent member of the G20. AU Chairperson Azali Assoumani and PM Modi shared a warm hug following the announcement.
articles.content:
The African Union became a permanent member of the G20 on Saturday, following a proposal put forth by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, that was welcomed by all member countries.
